alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 11:32PM PST until December 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Reduced visibility below 1 mile at times. Gusts to 40 mph. * WHERE...Owens Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Highway 395 and State Route 6, particularly on roadways less traveled. Visibility will be greatly reduced, adding to the travel hazards expected tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall is accumulating on area roadways including Highway 395 and State Route 6 in the Owens Valley, where chain restrictions are in place. Heaviest snowfall will occur from now until 1 AM PST. Bishop Airport is currently reporting a visibility of less than a mile.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
